name: Proman Management GmbH
goal:
Proman consulting develops, designs and manages innovation, research and development projects for business and non-profit organizations.
The team operates at the interface of academic and industrial research trying hard combining the advantages of two worlds: industry driven thinking and scientific curiosity for integrated process solutions.
Clients’ IP will be strictly protected.
interests: Agriculture, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Circular Economy
Fertilising Products Regulation
Animal By-products Regulation
Water Framework Directive
Waste Framework Directive
Industrial Emissions Directive
CAP
Critical Raw Materials Strategy
Activities related to Paris Agreement and SDGs
